meanings.definition: Moving in a way that involves crawling or creeping.
meanings.sent1: The spider was the crawliest creature in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillar is one of the crawliest insects.
meanings.sent3: The crawliest bug in the yard made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The vines twisted in the crawliest manner around the tree.
meanings.sent5: The dark, damp cave felt like the crawliest place on earth.

meanings.definition: Having the ability to crawl or creep.
meanings.sent1: The baby's crawliest stage was when he started moving on all fours.
meanings.sent2: Snakes are some of the crawliest creatures in the animal kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The crawliest toy in the box was the remote-controlled spider.
meanings.sent4: The fog crept in the crawliest way, enveloping the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The old, creaky house had the crawliest basement imaginable.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of 'crawly', meaning causing a sensation of fear or disgust.
meanings.sent1: The abandoned house on the hill looked like the crawliest place in town.
meanings.sent2: The horror movie had the crawliest scenes that made everyone jump.
meanings.sent3: The crawliest dish at the party was the jello with gummy worms.
meanings.sent4: The eerie silence in the forest felt like the crawliest presence watching.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house tour was the crawliest experience of the Halloween season.
